main event: A witness observed an unidentified object with 4 lights, one red and three white, in the night sky over Cincinnati, Ohio on May 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was brighter than a light bulb,The object appeared to maneuver 2-3 times in diameter,The sky was clear during the sighting at night,The witness reported that the object moved very slowly and always seemed to stop,The sighting lasted for a total duration of 0 hours, indicating a brief observation.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with 4 lights
witness description: a male, 36 years old, reported the sighting
